entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
